item.title: Listbox Widget
item.description: Select inputs are commonly used in Shiny for creating dropdown menus. Select inputs are easy to use, but they are not easy to style using CSS. An alternative solution is the listbox widget.
item.dc:creator: @dcruvolo

item.title: Creating Internal Links
item.description: The app shiny-links replaces the previous examples on creating links to tabs and panels in shiny apps. I rewrote the previous method using a functional component and a Shiny Input Binding.
item.dc:creator: @dcruvolo

item.title: Setting Document Attributes
item.description: When evaluating Shiny applications in terms of web accessibility, assessment tools will always throw an error: 'Document language missing'. Shiny does not set this attribute and others like it by default. In this tutorial, we will learn how to fix this.
item.dc:creator: @dcruvolo
